content:
{"name": "Community Meals", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please register to receive meals by filling form at this site https://communitymealsonwheels.org/register/
Meals are delivered Monday through Friday between 11:30-12:30.  We do not deliver on the following holidays: New Years Day, Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, the Friday after Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day.

Please note that when an above holiday falls on a weekend, CMI typically observes that one-day holiday on the preceding Friday or following Monday, whichever is closer. We will notify clients in advance. 

In the event we have to close due to inclement weather, we follow the school closures of Ridgewood Public Schools.", "email": "", "url": "https://communitymealsonwheels.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "354 Rock Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Glen Rock", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07452", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9617821, "longitude": -74.12440889999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 447-8295", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
